title: As Dusk Falls
notes: Steam shows Very Positive: 90% of 3,307 reviews; Metacritic metascore 77. Blended to low‑80s. Official FAQ and companion app describe up to 8 players on the same screen using controllers and smartphones.
raw_comment: Interactive story based on choices. Up to 8 players can experience the game together by using the companion app to vote on choices. Phones as controllers. Shared screen.
